name: Zucchini Fritters
instructions: Squeeze excess water out of the grated zucchini.
In a large bowl, mix the zucchini, egg, flour, Parmesan, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Spoon small amounts of the mixture into the pan and flatten with a spatula.
Fry until golden brown on both sides, about 3 minutes per side.
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
